text: Devitɨn mɨdorozir gumazir dapanibar tongɨn, marazi men faragha zui. Gumazamiziba ziar kam me gatɨ, Devitɨn Mɨdorozir Gumazir Gavgavir 30pla. Dughiar mamɨn, azenir igiabar dagheba asir dughiam izima, Devitɨn Mɨdorozir Gumazir Gavgavir 30plan tongɨn, gumazir 3pla dɨkavigha, Devit bagha ghua Adulamɨn dagɨar torimɨn23:13 Nɨ 1 Samuel 22:1ɨn gan. a bato. Ezɨ Filistiaba uaghan dughiar kamran iza Refaimɨn danganir zarimɨn uari bagha averpenibar ingarigha iti.
